tasks.task: Define agribusiness and explore its components**
subtasks: Identify the root words of "agribusiness"*
Understand the definition of business from the Oxford Economics Dictionary*
Combine the concepts of agriculture and business to define agribusiness*
Explore alternative definitions of business from the same dictionary*
Consider the implications of agribusiness for farm structures and operations*
Identify the roots of "agribusiness".
Understand the definition of business from the Oxford dictionary.
Combine the concepts to define agribusiness.
Examine the etymology of the word "agribusiness".
Research the Oxford Economics Dictionary definition of business.
Synthesize the definitions to articulate what agribusiness entails.
Identify agriculture practices (crops and livestock).
Identify business aspects (manufacturing and selling food).
Recall the roots of the word.
Paraphrase the Oxford Economics Dictionary definition.
Explain the combination of agriculture and business in agribusiness.

tasks.task: Take notes on the explanation of agribusiness.
subtasks: Listen to the definition.
Write key terms such as "agriculture," "business," "profit-seeking," etc.
Note the examples of activities: crops, livestock, manufacturing, and food sales.
Break down the term "agribusiness" into its components.
Recall and explain the definition of "business" from the Oxford dictionary.
Integrate the concepts of agriculture and business to explain agribusiness.
Identify the examples of activities within agribusiness (e.g., crops, livestock, manufacturing, food sales).
